description: The next evolution of an invention that's been brilliant from the start, the Keele™ Grid Hoody takes the durable doubleweave this family style is known for and adds a brushed grid backer to draw moisture away from your skin as you sweat. Helping maintain comfort from the inside out, even as you move beyond your comfort zone, this fabrication ensures peace of mind from the get-go, using bluesign®-approved recycled materials and non-toxic waterproofing that's as gentle on the environment as it is on you.
name: Mountain Hardwear Keele Grid Hoody - Mens
